channel.title: CVE Feed for Suite CRM -- Suite CRM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Suite CRM -- Suite CRM

item.title: CVE-2023-6388|2024-07-05T17:21:39.515Z -- suite%20crm -- suite%20crm
item.description:
Suite CRM version 7.14.2 allows making arbitrary HTTP requests through
the vulnerable server. This is possible because the application is vulnerable
to SSRF.

item.title: CVE-2024-1644|2024-06-04T18:01:03.462Z -- suite%20crm -- suite%20crm
item.description:
Suite CRM version 7.14.2 allows including local php files. This is possible
because the application is vulnerable to LFI.

item.title: CVE-2023-6388|2024-02-07T02:47:59.391Z -- suite%20crm -- suite%20crm
item.description:
Suite CRM version 7.14.2 allows making arbitrary HTTP requests through
the vulnerable server. This is possible because the application is vulnerable
to SSRF.
